mass1-tooltip: Mass of the primary star; this should be larger than or equal to the secondary star.
mass2-tooltip: Mass of the secondary star; this should be smaller than or equal to the orimary star.
ecc-tooltip: Eccentricity of the elliptical orbit: 0 is completely circular, 0.99 is nearly a straight line.
sep-tooltip: Separation between the two stars, in Solar radii.
time-tooltip: Time span of simulation in units of mega-years (= million years)
metal-tooltip: Metalliticity is the fraction of atoms with atom numbers higher than Helium compared to the total star mass (which is mainly Hydrogen and Helium)
